Comments_List: It was an interesting and comprehensive way to consider questions of the death penalty. Learned lots from the material and Prof. Bickart's way of teaching!

I learned a tremendous amount about ancient Judaism but also about ways to think about ancient texts and civilizations generally. This was the best seminar I have taken in yale college and thought my truly how to think and not just absorb information.

This course was well designed. I liked how we moved forward with the material chronologically, and alternated between Jewish and Christian sources. The course might be better as a class taught twice a week.
Absolutely! It's a very cool way to look at a topic that we often consider in a vacuum.

I would definitely recommend this course to another student! Prof. Bickart is an amazing professor, and the material is extremely interesting. I looked forward to this class every week - it was fun to engage in discussions about the material!
